learning_guide_1::milestone_finish::head: Igikurikira
learning_guide_1::clip_video_2::goals[0]: Erekana ingaruka y’ico uwo muntu akoze.
learning_guide_1::clip_photo_1::goals[0]: Fata umuntu ariko akora igikorwa kijanye n’inkuru yawe.
learning_guide_1::selfeval_card_0::text: Mbega ibikorwa vyawe, amasanamu birongereza ingaruka yinkuru yawe.
learning_guide_1::text_card_2::text: Subiramwo amasanamu yawe. uremeza yuko urukurikirane rwamasanamu yawe avuga inkuru isanzwe kandi ikwiye.
learning_guide_1::intro_card_0::headline: Ibigize inkuru.
learning_guide_1::text_card_1::text: Nivyiza. Ubu rero twongereko amasanamu mugukomeza inkuru yuwo muntu hamwe n’uduce twamasanamu wongereko igikorwa hamwe n’ingaruka.
learning_guide_1::markdown_card_1::text:
##Tora umuntu wo mu nkuru yawe.
Hitamwo umuntu afise inkuru yo kuvuga.
learning_guide_1::text_card_0::text: Erekana amasanamu atatu wamaze gukoresha nka karorero,Marvin,umuntu,shingiro y’inkuru.igikorwa n’ingaruka bitubwira ivyashikiye Marvin.
learning_guide_1::clip_audio_1::goals[0]: Fata ijwi uwo muntu ariko akora igikorwa kijanye n’inkuru.
learning_guide_1::title: Kwiga ibintu nshingiro bigize inkuru
learning_guide_1::clip_photo_2::goals[0]: Erekana ingaruka y’ico uwo muntu akoze.
learning_guide_1::markdown_card_0::text: Inkuru isanzwe ibifise ibintu bitatu :umuntu, igikorwa cakozwe nuwo muntu, ingaruka yico gikorwa. urashobora gushira hamwe ivyo bintu mukuvuga inkuru isanzwe.inkuru ikenera umuntu shingiro ategerezwa gukora igikorwa hama mu mpera abaraho baba bashaka kubona ingaruka yico gikorwa.
learning_guide_1::howto_card_0::text: Hanyuma hariho uduce twamasanamu.dukoreshe mukunganira amasanamu yuwo muntu.
learning_guide_1::clip_audio_2::goals[0]: Fata ijwi y’ingaruka y’igikorwa c’uwo muntu.
learning_guide_1::markdown_card_2::text:
## Akazi keza.
Story Makerifise ivyigwa vyinshi bibafasha kwiga neza cane kubijanye niyo nzira.
learning_guide_1::clip_video_1::goals[0]: Erekana uwo muntu ariko akora igikorwa kijanye niyo nkuru.
